name: Magnum Soupus
description: Click the soup to put it in the plate, the plate to eat it, watch out for the trash that you make cause it can distract you, but i bet the soup helps, to paint just put the cursor over the brush, there is no need to click it, there is 5 portraits that you can do, aim for your Magnum s(O)u(PUS), yeah, this game is cursed and make it ugly almost on purpose, it was really funny to do this. Made for Paint Jam 2021, hope you can laugh as much as i did.
